summary: Takeo is a young yakuza who renounces his former criminal activities after being released from prison. But sometimes escaping the past is not so easy.
cast: Yukio Mishima|Ayako Wakao|Eiji Funakoshi|Takashi Shimura|Yaeko Mizutani|Jun Negami|Keizô Kawasaki|Reizaburô Yamamoto|Michiko Ono|Shigeru Kôyama|Ken Mitsuda|Mayumi Kurata|Mantarô Ushio
title: Karakkaze yarô
